item.title: Db8 Timer
item.description: An ALL-IN-ONE Debate focused timer for all events!

item.title: Debate Tracker
item.description: Welcome to the Debate Tracker tool! Track bids, rounds, NSDA points, and more.

item.title: Judge ID-er
item.description: An updated philosophy tool - Parsing the existing taproom and forensics judging philosophies to make an all in one stop.

item.title: The DDQ
item.description: The DDQ gives debaters a new, thought-provoking question every day to write, reflect, or spar over.
